sn14.11:1.4: Abhadhatu, subhadhatu, akasanancayatanadhatu, vinnanancayatanadhatu, akincannayatanadhatu, nevasannanasannayatanadhatu, sannavedayitanirodhadhatu—
sn14.11:2.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn14.11:2.2: “ya cayam, bhante, abhadhatu ya ca subhadhatu ya ca akasanancayatanadhatu ya ca vinnanancayatanadhatu ya ca akincannayatanadhatu ya ca nevasannanasannayatanadhatu ya ca sannavedayitanirodhadhatu—ima nu kho, bhante, dhatuyo kim paticca pannayanti”ti?
sn14.11:3.1: “Yayam, bhikkhu, abhadhatu—ayam dhatu andhakaram paticca pannayati.
sn14.11:3.2: Yayam, bhikkhu, subhadhatu—ayam dhatu asubham paticca pannayati.
sn14.11:3.3: Yayam, bhikkhu, akasanancayatanadhatu—ayam dhatu rupam paticca pannayati.
sn14.11:3.4: Yayam, bhikkhu, vinnanancayatanadhatu—ayam dhatu akasanancayatanam paticca pannayati.
sn14.11:3.5: Yayam, bhikkhu, akincannayatanadhatu—ayam dhatu vinnanancayatanam paticca pannayati.
sn14.11:3.6: Yayam, bhikkhu, nevasannanasannayatanadhatu—ayam dhatu akincannayatanam paticca pannayati.
sn14.11:3.7: Yayam, bhikkhu, sannavedayitanirodhadhatu—ayam dhatu nirodham paticca pannayati”ti.
sn14.11:4.1: “Ya cayam, bhante, abhadhatu ya ca subhadhatu ya ca akasanancayatanadhatu ya ca vinnanancayatanadhatu ya ca akincannayatanadhatu ya ca nevasannanasannayatanadhatu ya ca sannavedayitanirodhadhatu—ima nu kho, bhante, dhatuyo katham samapatti pattabba”ti?
sn14.11:5.1: “Ya cayam, bhikkhu, abhadhatu ya ca subhadhatu ya ca akasanancayatanadhatu ya ca vinnanancayatanadhatu ya ca akincannayatanadhatu—ima dhatuyo sannasamapatti pattabba.
sn14.11:5.2: Yayam, bhikkhu, nevasannanasannayatanadhatu—ayam dhatu sankharavasesasamapatti pattabba.
sn14.11:5.3: Yayam, bhikkhu, sannavedayitanirodhadhatu—ayam dhatu nirodhasamapatti pattabba”ti.
